name: AnimalSoundsQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open Animal Sounds Quiz”
”Alexa, play Animal Sounds Quiz”
”Alexa, start Animal Sounds Quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal sounds quiz
des:
Start with "Alexa, open Animal Sounds Quiz".

Listen to the questions being asked and answer the animal's name.

There are 10 questions, and there are 3 hints per question.

If you want to hear the calling voice again, say "again".
If you want to end it, say "end".
If you want to start over, say "Start again".

We hope you enjoy it with your children.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
